query.sql: SELECT teacher_id, class_id, branch_id, enable_flag, course_id, t.last_update_by, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') create_date, DATE_FORMAT(t.last_update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') last_update_date, (select CONCAT(CONCAT(user_code,'-'),user_name) from sys_user where user_id =t.last_update_by) last_update_user FROM fnd_course t where t.class_id in (select class_id from fnd_class where enable_flag='Y') and t.branch_id in (select branch_id from fnd_branch where enable_flag='Y') #AND_CLAUSE# order by create_date desc
